snippet: Mrs. Saint’s gentle books, about the quaint and quirky English villages of Fairacre and Thrush Green, were a balm to postwar readers.
abstract: Dora Saint, popular postwar author who wrote as Miss Read, dies at age 98.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Saint’s gentle books, about the quaint and quirky English villages of Fairacre and Thrush Green, were a balm to postwar readers.

headline.seo: Dora Saint Dies at 98; Wrote of English Village Life
headline.main: Dora Saint, a k a Miss Read of Fiction Fame, Dies at 98
